meanings.definition: The quality or state of being sizable.
meanings.sent1: The sizeableness of the cake made it perfect for sharing at the party.
meanings.sent2: The sizeableness of the new house impressed the whole neighborhood.
meanings.sent3: The sizeableness of the puppy's ears made everyone giggle.
meanings.sent4: The sizeableness of the mountain cast a shadow over the valley.
meanings.sent5: The sizeableness of the elephant in the room could not be ignored.

meanings.definition: The extent or magnitude of something in terms of dimensions or proportions.
meanings.sent1: The sizeableness of the garden allowed for many flowers to bloom.
meanings.sent2: The sizeableness of the project required extra resources to complete on time.
meanings.sent3: The sizeableness of the ice cream scoop surprised the kids at the party.
meanings.sent4: The sizeableness of the ocean waves crashing against the shore was mesmerizing.
meanings.sent5: The sizeableness of the tree's roots spread far and wide in the forest.
